title: What just happened? Did I just get DDos'd?
body:
Game loading in fine, I've had no lag tonight whatsoever. All of a sudden my ping starts to spike a bit, followed by a strong 4K ping lag. My champ was just floating around and then next thing I know 3 of us on our team have dc'd and been killed whilst the other team was 100% fine? Is that just the server screwing up or was that a DDos? 

If so, should I be reporting that?

replies.body:
how is this even part of Gameplay and strategy boards?

how is this even relevant to boards at all?

if you have these sorts of concerns please lodge a support ticket.
